API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.Material

type
class
subclasses
sandy.materials.BitmapMaterial, sandy.materials.ColorMaterial, sandy.materials.WireFrameMaterial
version
3.1
The Material class is the base class for all materials.

Since the Material object is essentially a blank material, this class can be used to apply attributes without any material to a 3D object.

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_oAttr The attributes for this material.
Creates a material.

This constructor is never called directly - but by sub class constructors.

Instance Variables

__getFilters(default,method) : Void -> Array<flash.filters.BitmapFilter>

__getFlags(default,method) : Void -> Int

attributes : sandy.materials.attributes.MaterialAttributes

The attributes of this material.

autoDispose : Bool

Specifies if the material can automatically be disposed when unused Default value is to true

begin(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Calls begin method of the MaterialAttributes associated with this material.

dispose(default,method) : Void -> Void

Method to call when you want to release the resources of that material (filters, attributes and lreferences to polygons) Shape3D.DEFAULT_MATERIAL Material can't be disposed because might be used for later shape3D creations

filters(__getFilters,__setFilters) : Array<flash.filters.BitmapFilter>

The array of filters for this material.

You use this property to add an array of filters you want to apply to this material
To remove the filters, just assign an empty array.

finish(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Calls finish method of the MaterialAttributes associated with this material.

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

Contains specific material flags.

id(__getId,null) : Float

The unique id of this material.

init(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

Calls init method of the MaterialAttributes associated with this material.

lightingEnable : Bool

Specifies if the material can receive light and have light attributes applied to it. Can be useful to rapidly disable light on the object when unneeded.

modified(__getModified,null) : Bool

The modified state of this material.

true if this material or its line attributes were modified since last rendered, false otherwise.

renderPolygon(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> p_mcContainer : flash.display.Sprite -> Void

Renders the polygon dress in this material.

Implemented by sub classes.

renderSprite(default,method) : p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D -> p_oMaterial : Material -> p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

Renders the sprite dress in this material.

Basically only needed to apply attributes to sprites

repeat : Bool

The repeat property. This affects the way textured materials are mapped for U or V out of 0-1 range.

type(__getType,null) : MaterialType

The material type of this material.

unlink(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

Calls unlink method of the MaterialAttributes associated with this material.

unlinkAll(default,method) : Void -> haxe.FastList_sandy_core_data_Polygon

Unlink all the non used polygons

useVertexNormal : Bool

Specify if the material use the vertex normal information.
